message.body: Do you think Thomasin Would mind if I used their cutting board??
Not at all - I think they are fine with us using anything except their fancy pens
Awesome! I was inspired to do some cutting today.
Awesome - excited to hang out next Sunday - it's been so long!
Me too!! Hopefully I will have something to show you!
I would love that - let me know what I can do to support you!
I will. Hope you have a good week!
If you are around on Halloween - Alison bechdel is speaking at penn - let me know if you want to go
It's Caitlin's birthday dinner but maybe I can go before dinner!!
It's at 7:30 which sound like dinner time ??
Will you be in the studio for a while? Maybe I come by in an hour and say hi
I have to meet Alison at 4:30 to watch a cut of her film and then to Philadelphia film fest but I'll be here til then!!
Ok - just finishing making some soup - I'll come by in a bit. Want some soup?
I'm good! Just had some Pizza and an orange. Thanks tho!
